Augmentable.DESCRIPTION: Can be upgraded any number of times.

Boost.DESCRIPTION: This effect activates a limited number of times.

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play or discard this card, reduce its #yCooldown by 1. If the #yCooldown is at 0, activate its effect instead.

Flaming Weapon.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #yBurning.

Heartseeker.DESCRIPTION: If the target has less than #b50% HP, deal double damage.

Lazy.DESCRIPTION: This card's damage will be delayed by a random number of turns.

Legacy.DESCRIPTION: Triggers when this card is exhausted.

Loyal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card would enter your discard pile, shuffle it into your draw pile.

Motivate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

Orb Core.DESCRIPTION: #yPower: #yChannel orbs on use, gain a bonus effect on your second #ySynergy each turn.

Overrun.DESCRIPTION: Activates for each enemy that loses its block during this attack.

Persistent.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card would enter your discard pile, shuffle it into your draw pile.

Recall.DESCRIPTION: Trigger when this card is manually discarded or cycled.

Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

Resurrect.DESCRIPTION: If you would die, and this card is anywhere in your deck, prevent all Damage and permanently lose this card. Will not work if Exhausted or Purged.

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Synergy.DESCRIPTION: A card #ySynergizes if the card previously played this turn was from the same series.
